name: Business Challenges at the Ends of the World
name_original: Business Challenges at the Ends of the World
description:
Business Challenges at the Ends of the World Onboarding_Instructions.doc

Congratulations! You are a part of an elite corporation. We are leading the world to a brighter future and you are a critical stepping stone in the path to success.

Management.doc

Your job is simple:

  1. Hire Workers
  2. Assign Workers to Projects
  3. Grow our Wealth
Challenges.doc

As you may be aware, the world is falling apart. But we are pragmatic optimists. We aren't going to let a little apocalypse stop us from achieving our Business Objectives and Key Results. Good luck!

Warning.doc

This game is under Active Development and as such, should be considered Work In Progress!

Join our community on Discord to track development and join your fellow employees in daily stand ups.
